author: ajsutton
content:
I like the option of using SSZ but JSON is certainly nice to have because if zcli can't parse the SSZ you're got very little to go on as it's not a self describing format. 
The advantage of using CL REST-type serializations is that the JSON form follows the SSZ schema.  In Teku we're able to reuse that one schema to generate or parse both the SSZ and JSON forms which saves us a ton of work. Whereas the EL style is causing us to redefine all the same objects in a different schema.
